loops.name: Hallway Ambient Spiral Bass
loops.description: Description : I was looking for a particular rising ambient bass tone so I used an Oscillator which also created an extra layer of textures like when tightening up the release I got this Percussive sound that nearly mimicks footsteps and a hum that gives me hallway light bulb humming vibes. So in a few seconds of ambience I manage to visualize this whole liminal hallway setting accompanying the sound.
